miningmaster.config.title: Mining Master Config
miningmaster.config.tooltip.fireRubyEnab: Determines if Fire Ruby will generate.
miningmaster.config.tooltip.iceSapphireE: Determines if Ice Sapphire will generate.
miningmaster.config.tooltip.spiritGarnet: Determines if Spirit Garnet will generate.
miningmaster.config.tooltip.hastePeridot: Determines if Haste Peridot will generate.
miningmaster.config.tooltip.luckyCitrine: Determines if Lucky Citrine will generate.
miningmaster.config.tooltip.diveAquamari: Determines if Dive Aquamarine will generate.
miningmaster.config.tooltip.heartRhodoni: Determines if Heart Rhodonite will generate.
miningmaster.config.tooltip.powerPyriteE: Determines if Power Pyrite will generate.
miningmaster.config.tooltip.kineticOpalE: Determines if Kinetic Opal will generate.
miningmaster.config.tooltip.airMalachite: Determines if Air Malachite will generate.
miningmaster.config.tooltip.commonGemsPe: Determines how many times common gems will attempt to spawn per chunk in their native biomes. REQUIRES RESTART.
miningmaster.config.tooltip.rareGemsPerC: Determines how many times rare gems will attempt to spawn per chunk in their native biomes. REQUIRES RESTART.
miningmaster.config.tooltip.randomGemsPe: Determines how many times a random gem ore will attempt to spawn per chunk. REQUIRES RESTART.
enchantment.miningmaster.freezing.desc: Inflicts Slowness on hit. Also deals extra damage to fire-based entities.
enchantment.miningmaster.leeching.desc: Heals the user for a portion of damage dealt on critical strikes.
enchantment.miningmaster.smelting.desc: Causes blocks to drop the smelted version of their usual drops.
enchantment.miningmaster.stonebreaker.de: Causes certain stones and Netherrack to not drop when mined.
enchantment.miningmaster.runner.desc: Gives the user a boost to their base speed. Boots take durability damage when sprinting.
enchantment.miningmaster.heartfelt.desc: Gives the user an increase to their max health.
enchantment.miningmaster.floatation.desc: Applies levitation to enemies on hit.
enchantment.miningmaster.knight_jump.des: Gives the user extra mid-air jumps.
enchantment.miningmaster.snowpiercer.des: Grants the user the Speed effect when on snow or ice.
enchantment.miningmaster.grace.desc: Gives the user a burst of Dolphin's Grace when entering water, at the cost of durability decay while the effect is active. Requires the user to return to land to recharge.
tetra.improvement.enchantment/miningmast: Floatation
Applies levitation to enemies on hit.
Freezing
Inflicts Slowness on hit. Also deals extra damage to fire-based entities.
Grace
Gives the user a burst of Dolphin's Grace when entering water, at the cost of durability decay while the effect is active. Requires the user to return to land to recharge.
Heartfelt
Gives the user an increase to their max health.
Knight Jump
Gives the user extra mid-air jumps.
Leeching
Heals the user for a portion of damage dealt on critical strikes.
Runner
Gives the user a boost to their base speed. Boots take durability damage when sprinting.
Smelting
Causes blocks to drop the smelted version of their usual drops.
Snowpiercer
Grants the user the Speed effect when on snow or ice.
Stonebreaker
Causes certain stones and Netherrack to not drop when mined.
